import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const CheckOut = () => { const user = useSelector(state => state.user) let courses = localStorage.getItem("Cart") ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Cart")) : []; return(
{courses.map((course,i)=> (
  • {course.productName}
))}
